name: P.A.R.R. - Planetary AI Research Rover
description:
Html5 (web) version here https://astralbyte.itch.io/parr-planetary-ai-research-rover-html5  However, desktop version recommended

P.A.R.R. - Planetary AI Research Rover is a game about exploration and recovering lost tech parts to complete your mission █████████  on planet ███████.  It appears some of your memory was REDACTED for an unknown reason.

  • Controls (F1) for help
  • WASD to move
  • Space - Brakes
  • Right Mouse - Rotate Camera
  • Scroll Wheel - Zoom
  • Left-click slot (in build area) install part
  • Control-left-click slot (remove part)
  • M - Toggle music
  • ESC - Pause menu

First godot gamejam, started 4 days late so had to rush and leave some content out.  Will update if enough interest.  Thanks for playing and any feedback welcome!
